TopicTitle: You know what this game really needs...........

Articles.Content: A kerbal death count meter. That way we can see how many widows we have created..........
I wish Squad would bring back the KIA screen. I miss knowing that my Kerbal Is Alright.

I once had a re-entry that got 82.1G's(my current personnel best). There was no problem for the Kerbals whatsoever.

In all fairness I think a Kerbal (why doesn't the forum recognise Kerbal as a word yet?) death meter would detract from the game. The Kerbal system seems too light-hearted and relaxed to add something as morbid as a death meter.
